Book Event
Badfins Restaurant Clearwater Beach
¬ª
Book Event
LOOKING FOR A RESTAURANT TO HOST YOUR NEXT EVENT?
Badfins Food + Brew offers the perfect venue to host your next corporate event, wedding party, birthday or special day. Please fill out the contact form below and one of our event specialists will be in touch with in 24 hours.
CORPORATE EVENT VENUES AND
WEDDINGS -Clearwater Beach, Florida
View our
Floor Plan
Looking for a beachside VENUE to host your next event?
Badfins Food + Brew is an American restaurant with a fresh menu that can be best summarized by its latino fusion and seafood dishes. Each item on our menu is made in-house. We invite you to plan your next event at our beachside restaurant.
Am i able to buyout the entire restaurant?
Yes! We offer full restaurant buyouts. Please contact us for more information at by filling out the form below.
Am i able to do a partial buyout?
No, we no longer offer partial buy-outs. Sorry about that üòâ
How many guests can you accommodate?
We are able to host parties up to 100 guests.
Can I decorate the space?
Yes! Badfins Food + Brew is designed to be a space all your own. We want you to customize the space to be what you want it to be. We only ask that you leave it as you found it. If you do decide to utilize the walls by hanging things or for decoration purposes, we require that you talk to us about your plans beforehand and incur the costs to put the space back to its original form.
How late can we stay?
This all depends on how long you rent the venue for. Alcohol is cut off at 12 AM, however, the venue can be rented past this time if desired. Please let us know what you need and we will do our best make it happen!
Is there outside space? And do we have access to it?
Yes, the majority of our space is outdoors. Our outdoor comfort patio comes equipped with electric screens to deter the weather, fans, misters, and heaters when it gets cold outside (Yes, Florida can get cold, 1 time per year). In addition to the comfort patio we also have a quaint beer garden, social media wall, and indoor space that feature our 34 taps and drink area. If you are looking for a fun an intimate space look no further!
What are the dining options?
We offer dining options for events for any size such as prix fixe menus, buffet style as well as cocktail parties featuring Hors d‚Äôoeuvres and open bar options. Be sure to ask us about our ‚ÄòTaco About A Party‚Äô party theme. It is perfect for any event!
Do you offer open bar?
Yes, you can either choose from an open bar (flat fee) option or simply leave a credit card on file with a preauthorized cut-off limit.
Is there parking?
Yes! We have pre-negotiated rate at the Wyndham Grand valet. Please be sure to discuss your parking needs with us.
Do you Have Audio/Visual ABILITIES?
Yes! Every restaurant buyout comes with the ability to display a company or sponsor logos on TV‚Äôs throughout the restaurant. Have a favorite Spotify music playlist? Send it to us and we will play it during your event! Looking for live entertainment? We can help with that too!
When do we have to pay our balance?
Your initial balance is paid at the time of booking. If you have an additional balance or require additional needs from the event space, we will charge you prior to your event. If expenses are incurred after the party is over, you will be required to pay your balance following your event.
Who can I talk to for venue needs on the day of event?
There will be a Badfins Food + Brew representative on site during your function that can help you with all your needs.
Can you hold a date for me?
We are happy to hold a date for you. If you wish to hold a date, we require 50% of the deposit, which will be applied to your total event cost. We will hold the date for up to two weeks. This gives you first right of refusal if someone else wants your same date.
Are we required to clean the venue following the event?
We have a cleaning crew come in after your event, please take all of your personal belongings.
Book Reservation
Book a reservation for small parties up to 10 guests below:
Book Reservation

Badfins Food + Brew Reservations Description and Rules
Outdoor Seating Only:¬†¬†Our establishment offers a convertible covered patio as well as an area for suntanning.
Reservation Policy:¬†¬†Seating can be reserved for parties ranging from two to ten guests. For groups of ten or more, please direct your inquiries to
events@badfins.com
.
Pet Policy:¬† We are pleased to inform you that we are a dog-friendly venue.
Deposit Policy:¬† No-show deposits will be processed the following day.
Seating Options:¬† We primarily provide high-top seating, with a limited number of low-top seating options available.
BOOK YOUR NEXT EVENT WITH US‚Ä¶
We offer two kinds of events. 

A Guarantee Seating Package a prefixed sit down dinner for groups more than 10 guests up to 25 guests.
For parties larger than 25 up to 120 guests we offer a buffet package with combined bar packages.
If your interested in either one of these of events or want to customize your event please contact
events@badfins.com
*Most events range from 40-100 People - Buffet Style Dinner & Open Bar w/ Live Music

GALLERY
A WELCOMING ENVIROMENT
Badfins Food + Brew is located at the Wyndham Grand Clearwater Beach. Situated on America's recently rated #1 Beach, Badfins', casual modern design is fun and welcoming throughout -with a large outdoor patio, beer garden, large selec-tion of local craft beer, wine, and handcrafted cocktails. Influenced by the St. Petersburg art scene, Badfins Food+ Brew is not like any other restaurant on Clearwater Beach.
